Events

CURATED BY THE VINES

Annual Members Homecoming with Francis Mallmann

Spend the weekend grilling with Francis Mallmann, harvesting Malbec and drinking all the best Argentina has to offer; participate in optional courses on farming, winemaking, tasting and even cooking with Francis himself; and go on Gaucho-style horseback rides through our vineyards.

MENDOZA, ARGENTINA

Blending Weekend MontalcinoFrancis Mallmann

Spend the weekend grilling with Francis Mallmann, harvesting Malbec and drinking all the best Argentina has to offer; participate in optional courses on farming, winemaking, tasting and even cooking with Francis himself; and go on Gaucho-style horseback rides through our vineyards.

MONTALCINO, TUSCANY ITALY

Label Making Master Class MontalcinoFrancis Class Making Master

Put The Vines label design kit to work in this interactive workshop with legendary artist and designer Cey Adams. wine label and shows how to create your own.Get a fascinating window into the designer’s mind as he develops his own wine label and shows how to create your own.

MENDOZA, ARGENTINA

Annual Members Homecoming with Francis Mallmann

Spend the weekend grilling with Francis Mallmann, harvesting Malbec and drinking all the best Argentina has to offer; participate in optional courses on farming, winemaking, tasting and even cooking with Francis himself; and go on Gaucho-style horseback rides through our vineyards.

Blending Weekend MontalcinoFrancis Mallmann

Spend the weekend grilling with Francis Mallmann, harvesting Malbec and drinking all the best Argentina has to offer; participate in optional courses on farming, winemaking, tasting and even cooking with Francis himself; and go on Gaucho-style horseback rides through our vineyards.
